nodes.excerpt: Hiro Wallet is a safe way to manage your STX, sign into decentralized apps, and protect your funds while interacting with the Stacks blockchain.
nodes.title: Hiro Wallet for Stacks - Access DeFi & Web 3 apps built w/ Stacks in Chrome & Firefox
nodes.author: Mark Hendrickson

nodes.excerpt: SVG Gobbler is an open source browser extension that helps make designing and developing easier by finding, processing, exporting, optimizing, and managing vector content.
nodes.title: SVG Gobbler - Download, optimize, and process vector SVGs
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Scape is a simple and elegant new tab page designed to show you important information quickly. Some of the core features: - Free and Open Source - Customisable (visual editor coming in a later update) - Accurate Weather - Available on Chromium and Firefox
nodes.title: Scape - Your new tab page, everyday
nodes.author: Gautaman

nodes.excerpt: Super Agent fills out cookie consent forms based on your preferences, saving you time and letting you take control of your privacy.
nodes.title: Super Agent - Automatic cookie consent
nodes.author: Humberto

nodes.excerpt: All you got to do is check/uncheck to filter tweets from verified tweeple only! Works in the home feed, search results, tweet replies, and anywhere else tweets show up!
nodes.title: Verified Tweets Only - Simple browser extension to filter only verified tweets
nodes.author: Rajat Vaghani

nodes.excerpt: Low contrast text is the most common accessibility issue and affects 86.4% of pages. This free extension based on technology developed for Polypane (https://polypane.app) automatically fixes contrast issues on any site you visit.
nodes.title: Fix contrast - Automatically fix contrast issues on all websites
nodes.author: Kilian Valkhof

nodes.excerpt: The Zoho Sheet web clipper allows you to clip data tables in to spreadsheets in an instant. Using this extension, you can create, access, or spreadsheets in a click. In short, this extension brings Zoho Sheet one step closer to you.
nodes.title: Zoho Sheet Extension & Web Clipper - Clip data and access spreadsheets in an instant
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Save those interesting websites, images, videos, tabs and text you find online, then access from anywhere on any device. Share and collaborate with others OR store those sensitive sites in hidden collections that only show with a pin (away from prying eyes)
nodes.title: Siimpl Bookmarking - Simple way to organize your bookmarks on any device
nodes.author: Garry Cummins

nodes.excerpt: Sometimes typing a URL is faster than opening a bookmark. âš¡ï¸Search Bar Shortcuts (Omnibox shortcuts) are built for people who often access some websites this way. The extension makes it even quicker, more reliable & predictable.
nodes.title: Search Bar Shortcuts - Enter keywords instead of full URLs in your browser
nodes.author: Maksym  Potapenko

nodes.excerpt: Surfing instead of working? Getting distracted in the browser? â€ƒ Our extension helps you set it up so that don't get side-tracked and stay on task. â€ƒ You can set up healthy limits with Site Limits, Fun Zones (or Focus Zones), or Batch Rules and focus better!
nodes.title: Deprocrastination 2.0 - Turn your browser into a productivity machine
nodes.author: Vita Benes

nodes.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
nodes.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox
nodes.author: Harry Qi

nodes.excerpt: The Developerâ€™s Homepage ___ Hackertab, a handy extension to help developers stay up-to-date with the latest tech happenings. Itâ€™s fully customizable, for frontend, backend, full-stack, mobile, data scientistsâ€¦ bref, for all developers.
nodes.title: Hackertab.dev - Hottest programming trends right in your tab ğŸ”¥
nodes.author: Mehdi Sakout

nodes.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. Whatâ€™s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - itâ€™s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
nodes.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!
nodes.author: Eyobiel Andebrhan

nodes.excerpt: TabFloater improves your productivity by providing a "Picture-in-Picture" functionality, but it's not limited to video - you can use it with any website!
nodes.title: TabFloater - Browser extension to use picture-in-picture with any website
nodes.author: BalÃ¡zs GyurÃ¡k

nodes.excerpt: Ethical Product Alternatives is a simple, open-source browser extension built to help you discover new, more ethical tools focused on privacy every time you open a new tab.
nodes.title: Ethical Product Alternatives - Ethical alternative products every time you open a new tab
nodes.author: Ria Blagburn

nodes.excerpt: New Tab Todo is a simple browser extension which lets you add and manage your day-to-day tasks whenever you open your browser's new tab! Try it & you'll love it..
nodes.title: NewTabTodo - Task management in your browser's new tab
nodes.author: Muhammad Ovi

nodes.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

nodes.excerpt: See errors, warnings, and logs as they happen on your site â€” without having to open the browserâ€™s console. Find bugs you didn't know were there via notifications in toast format.
nodes.title: toast.log 2.0 - Get console errors right on your page (as toasts)
nodes.author: Guilherme Rizzo
